scripts.resume:validate: resumed validate data/resume.en.json && resumed validate data/resume.ru.json
scripts.resume:html: mkdir -p assets/resume && resumed render data/resume.en.json -t jsonresume-theme-even -o assets/resume/index.html
scripts.resume:pdf:en: mkdir -p assets/resume && resumed export data/resume.en.json -t jsonresume-theme-even -o assets/resume/ilia-resume-en.pdf
scripts.resume:pdf:ru: mkdir -p assets/resume && resumed export data/resume.ru.json -t jsonresume-theme-even -o assets/resume/ilia-resume-ru.pdf
scripts.resume:build: npm run resume:validate && npm run resume:html && npm run resume:pdf:en && npm run resume:pdf:ru
